family_members.name: noa
family_members.greeting: Happy birthday, Rami! I'm eagerly anticipating the entire family gathering for a skiing trip.

family_members.name: gaya
family_members.greeting: Happy birthday Rami, you're the best, Sixty years strong, and you stand out from the rest.  You share your crypto smarts, making it clear, Talking with you is always a joy, my dear.  Thanks for being patient, kind, and so wise, In sixty years, you've been quite the prize.  Here's to more talks, laughter, and stories untold, Happy birthday, Uncle Rami, worth more than gold!

family_members.name: ilay
family_members.greeting: Happy 60th birthday, May this milestone be a celebration of the incredible journey you've had so far, filled with joy, love, and unforgettable moments. May the years ahead be just as amazing, bringing you more happiness and fulfillment. Cheers to a wonderful cousin and the many adventures yet to come!
